bibl.title: Exploratio. Military and Political Intelligence in the Roman World from the Second Punic War to the Battle of Adrianople.
bibl.note: Uses the papyrological evidence. - See in part. pp. 155-161: The Governor's Archives. - Pp. 291-292: Index of Sources. Papyri and Palaeographical Sources.
bibl.seg: AUSTIN N.J.E. and N.B. RANKOV, Exploratio. Military and Political Intelligence in the Roman World from the Second Punic War to the Battle of Adrianople.
London - New York, Routledge, 1995, 8°, xv-292 pp., 14 cartes et plans et 11 pll. ISBN 0-415-04945-8. £45.
Uses the papyrological evidence. - See in part. pp. 155-161: The Governor's Archives. - Pp. 291-292: Index of Sources. Papyri and Palaeographical Sources.
